TestCase.name: testMaxWithRetractOptimizeWithLocalGlobal
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1, MAX(a3) AS EXPR$1]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a1, a3], outputBinaryRow=[true]) StreamExecGlobalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1, a2], select=[a1, a2, MAX(max$0) AS a3]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a1, a2]]) StreamExecLocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1, a2], select=[a1, a2, MAX(a3) AS max$0]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

StreamExecGroupAggregate(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) StreamExecCalc(retract=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) StreamExecGlobalGroupAggregate(retract=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecLocalGroupAggregate(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc])
